CA3 stratum lacunosum moleculare.Synonym: CA3 part of stratum lacunosum moleculare
CA3 stratum lacunosum moleculare.Definition: Part of stratum lacunosum-moleculare in area CA3. It is bounded by the stratum lacunosum-moleculare of CA2 and CA1. It is bounded superficially by the pial surface and deep by the CA3 stratum radiatum. It is continuous with the stratum lacunosum-moleculare of CA2.
